item.description:
RI NOW’s purpose is to take action to bring women into full participation in all aspects of public and private life without experiencing barriers or bias based on gender.

http://rinow08.files....


Our Key Areas of Interest:

Promoting Economic Justice
Advancing Reproductive Health and Justice
Stopping Violence Against Women
Securing Lesbian/Gay Rights
Ending Racism


RI NOW’s signature VDay event is an open mic night
designed to give us all an opportunity to share stories
about how we learned (or didn’t learn) about sex and
human sexuality.

When: Tuesday, March 9, 2010

Where: Hi-Hat, 3 Davol Square, Providence

Time: 7:00 p.m.

Cost: $15 Donation* - $10 with student I.D.


Tickets can be purchased at www.ArtTixRI.com
cash bar & light hors d’oeuvres provided.

Whether your sex ed experiences were humorous,
embarrassing, poignant, or just woefully inadequate,
come out and share stories with RI NOW friends and
allies in a safe, supportive, and fun environment.
item.name: RI NOW: A PROGRESSIVE VOICE FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE
